<NAME>APPLICATION_CODE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>EVENT_CODE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>QUESTION_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>QUESTION</NAME> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>RECORD_DATE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ANSWER_01</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ANSWER_02</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE, SJQ.EVENT_CODE, SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID QUESTION_ID, SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_EN QUESTION, SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_AR, DECODE(SJQ.QUESTION_TYPE,'rating','RADIO_GROUP','boolean','TRUE_FALSE') QUESTION_TYPE, ORDER_ SEQ, RECORD_DATE, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=1 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_01, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=2 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_02, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=3 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_03, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=4 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_04, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=5 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_05, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=6 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_06, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=7 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_07, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=8 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_08, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=9 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_09, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=10 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_10, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=11 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_11, (SELECT QUESTIONAIR_AR FROM SURVEY_SUB_QUESTIONS SJSQ WHERE SJSQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID=SJQ.QUESTIONAIR_ID AND SJSQ.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND SUB_QUESTIONAIR_ID=12 AND SJSQ.APPLICATION_CODE = SJQ.APPLICATION_CODE AND SJSQ.EVENT_CODE = SJQ.EVENT_CODE AND SJQ.RECORD_DATE = SJSQ.RECORD_DATE AND SJSQ.TYPE = 'boolean') ANSWER_12 FROM SURVEY_GENERAL_QUESTIONS SJQ WHERE SJQ.HAS_FRFT = 1 ORDER BY ORDER_ </SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
